room_title: Escape room "What Happened in Raven Woods?" by Locksmith Escape Games in Orlando
review: Our group did the Ravenswood room, and it was super interesting, and really creepy! We had a good team and all worked together to escape. Locksmith Escape Games was awesome! And the game masters were super helpful and friendly. Thank you! Will be back

room_title: Escape room "What Happened in Raven Woods?" by Locksmith Escape Games in Orlando
review: We booked a room for just the two of us and we were really happy to find that it was going to be a private experience. They don't just fill up the room with anyone who wants to join. The puzzles were tough enough to challenge us and the hints were straightforward and helpful. We were in the Ravenswood room: creepy, mildly scary, fun!

room_title: Escape room "What Happened in Raven Woods?" by Locksmith Escape Games in Orlando
review: I had such a great time!! We did Ravenwood and curse of the evil genie!! Both were exciting and beautifully done! I canâ€™t wait to do voodoo island The staff there are awesome and make the experience great!
